title: 329: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: HOMETOWNS (We’re in Love with All the Men + Bachelor “Announced” + Mini Ep 6 Recap)
itunes:title: 329: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: HOMETOWNS (We’re in Love with All the Men + Bachelor “Announced” + Mini Ep 6 Recap)
description:
The Bachelorette Recapping Broads are back! They cover the big moments they missed in last week’s episode (peace out, Martin) and discuss Clayton “officially” being announced as Bachelor. Then they dive into Michelle’s Hometowns! They chat details about this Top 4 whom are all clearly in love with our Bachelorette, who they believe is best for Michelle, who they believe is the front runner, their favorite moments (some cringe) from perhaps the best Hometowns that we’ve ever seen and more! 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/14CHATTY and use code 14CHATTY for up to 14 free meals AND 3 free gifts!
***STAMPS.COM: get a 4-week trial PLUS free shipping credits + digital shipping scale at STAMPS.COM with code CHATTY! 

***HONEY: Get Honey for FREE at JOINHONEY.COM/CHATTY
